group_1.textRight: I'm sorry I sent you guys a message like that@out of the blue.

group_1.textLeft: No, I was beginning to lose sight of my own@identity, too.

group_1.textRight: I'm the same as well, Sasha-dono and@Himuro-dono.
I couldn't help but grow restless, unable to@shake the feeling of being targeted by something...

group_1.textLeft: ...If we don't defeat Witches and obtain Grief Seeds,
we'll turn into Witches just like they did, right?
I haven't had the courage to fight Witches@since then...
But, the idea of becoming a Witch is frightening...
I know it's really selfish of me, but I just wanted@someone by my side...
A companion, so we can confront our true@selves and fight Witches together...

group_1.textRight: Honestly, I couldn't ask for anything better.
Time slipped away from me as I was brooding@and agonizing over it,
and before I knew it, my Soul Gem was just@as it is now.

group_1.textLeft: It looks like yours is as tainted as mine, right?
At this rate, I fear all three of us will exhaust@ourselves and eventually collapse...
It would be a blessing if we could fight together,@for we are all sullied.
Besides, now would be a great time to find out@if the three of us are compatible.

group_1.textRight: Those who share the secret of Magical Girls@have teamed up.
But now that it's time to confront a Labyrinth,@the tension is nerve-wracking...

group_1.textLeft: Knowing that she used to be a fellow Magical Girl@makes me feel guilty about defeating the Witch...
But if they're left unchecked, our town's people@will be cursed...

group_1.textRight: ...Those girls became Witches after saving the girl@in front of them...
If we disgracefully turn our backs here,
we would be tarnishing the integrity of such@heroic Magical Girls...

group_1.textLeft: To uphold the pure ideals they once held,
we must defeat the Witches they become.
Yes, simply abandoning the Witches would betray@the sentiments of the past.
